questions.title: RICE Prioritization
questions.prompt: Explain the RICE prioritization framework and how to use it.
followups: What are the limitations of RICE?
How do you gather data for RICE scoring?

questions.title: OKRs vs KPIs
questions.prompt: Explain the difference between OKRs and KPIs and when to use each.
followups: How do you write effective OKRs?
What makes a good KPI for a product?

questions.title: User Journey Mapping
questions.prompt: What is a user journey map and how do you create one?
followups: What insights can you gain from journey mapping?
How do you identify pain points in a user journey?

questions.title: A/B Testing Strategy
questions.prompt: How do you design and interpret A/B tests for product features?
followups: How do you determine sample size for an A/B test?
What are common pitfalls in A/B testing?

questions.title: Market Segmentation
questions.prompt: How do you segment your market and why is it important?
followups: What criteria can you use for segmentation?
How do you prioritize which segments to target?

questions.title: Product Strategy Development
questions.prompt: How do you develop a product strategy from business objectives?
followups: What elements should a product strategy include?
How do you align product strategy with company vision?

questions.title: North Star Metric
questions.prompt: What is a North Star Metric and how do you choose one?
followups: What makes a good North Star Metric?
How do you align team goals around a North Star Metric?

questions.title: Cross-functional Leadership
questions.prompt: How do you lead without authority across engineering, design, and marketing teams?
followups: What strategies help build credibility with engineering teams?
How do you handle conflicts between departments?

questions.title: Product Discovery Process
questions.prompt: Describe the product discovery process and its importance.
followups: What activities are included in product discovery?
How do you know when discovery is complete?

questions.title: Technical Debt Management
questions.prompt: How do you balance new features with technical debt repayment?
followups: How do you quantify technical debt?
What strategies help prevent technical debt accumulation?

questions.title: Pricing Strategy
questions.prompt: How do you approach pricing for a new product or feature?
followups: What factors influence pricing decisions?
How do you test different pricing models?

questions.title: Product-Market Fit Measurement
questions.prompt: How do you measure and improve product-market fit?
followups: What surveys can help measure product-market fit?
How do you act on product-market fit insights?

questions.title: Feature Adoption Analysis
questions.prompt: How do you measure and improve feature adoption?
followups: What metrics indicate healthy feature adoption?
How do you identify barriers to adoption?

questions.title: Stakeholder Alignment
questions.prompt: How do you get executive alignment on product direction?
followups: What techniques help build consensus among executives?
How do you handle disagreement about product direction?

questions.title: Data-Driven Decision Making
questions.prompt: How do you use data to make product decisions when data is incomplete or conflicting?
followups: What do you do when qualitative and quantitative data conflict?
How do you balance data with intuition?
